element.name: downloadProduct
element.selector: //li[not(following-sibling::li[span[@title='Bundle Product']]) and not(following-sibling::li[span[@title='Simple Product']]) and not(following-sibling::li[span[@title='Configurable Product']]) and not(following-sibling::li[span[@title='Grouped Product']]) and not(following-sibling::li[span[@title='Virtual Product']])]/span[@title='Downloadable Product']
